cartesianNetwork

Class Individual

  • java.lang.Object
    • cartesianNetwork.Individual
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Individual
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Adresses of the Individual as follows: input Addresses: [0 , (inputAmount-1)] node Addresses: [inputAmount,(inputAmount+nodes.size()-1)
    Author:
    Björn Piepenbrink
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
